summary: Simple replacers for werewolf brothers Vilkas and Farkas!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center][b]Meet my version of the werewolf brothers Farkas and Vilkas! =D

[i](Please, this is my first Skyrim mod ever, so let me know if I messed up and I'll try to fix it ASAP.)[/i][/b][/center]
[center]
[b][u]Farkas:[/u][/b]
[url=http://imgur.com/qG4BdM8][img]http://i.imgur.com/qG4BdM8.jpg[/img][/url][/center]


[center][b][u]Vilkas (version 1.01):[/u][/b]
[url=http://imgur.com/w6Agzju][img]http://i.imgur.com/w6Agzju.jpg[/img][/url][/center]


[b][u]PS:[/u][/b] If you also were tired of mourning over your husband's tragic death in some filthy dungeon... those times are gone! [u]They're both essential now![/u]


[b][u]Required:[/u][/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by Apachii


[b][u]Installation:[/u][/b]

- Download the brother of your choice (or both!).
- Extract the .BSA and .ESP files on your Skyrim/Data folder.
- Open the Skyrim launcher and check both on the Data Files option.
- Order the mods properly with a tool like [url=http://boss-developers.github.io/]BOSS[/url].
- Enjoy! =D


[b][u]Uninstallation:[/u][/b]

- Uncheck the mod/s from the Data Files option on the Skyrim launcher.
- Delete the mod files from the Skyrim/Data folder.
- Done! =D


[b][u]Incompatibilities/conflicts:[/u][/b] any mod that alters the appearance of Vilkas and/or Farkas.


[b][u]Update 1.01 (08/29):[/u][/b] changed Vilkas because his hair glitched behind his ears.


[b][u]Recommended (optional):[/u][/b]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards[/url] by Hvergelmir
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963/?]True Eyes[/url] by JimtownIrish
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]True Brows[/url] by JimtownIrish
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?]High Res Face Maps for Men[/url] by Geonox
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34147/?]aMidianBorn wolf armor and skyforge weapons[/url] (brown version) by EmeraldReign 83Willow CaBaL 


[b][u]Also used on the screenshots (but not required):[/u][/b]

- [url=http://www.enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]ENB[/url] by Boris Vorontsov
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field[/url] by Gopher and MyGoodEye
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222/?]Immersive HUD - iHUD[/url] by Gopher
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12110/?]Beautiful Whiterun[/url] by MorninJerky
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1546/?]Hybrids HD Plants and Herbs Retexture[/url] by Gabriel Gullbergh - Mystikhybrid


[b][u]Tools used:[/u][/b]

- [url=http://www.creationkit.com/Main_Page]Creation Kit[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4554/?]Skyrim NPC Editor 0_75_1[/url] by foretrenty
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23972/?]Easy NPC creation tutorial[/url] by BravoOskar


You may also want to check my replacers for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57638/?]Lydia[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57637/?]Aela[/url]! =D

Let me know of any issues on the comments section.

Feel free to PM me with requests for mods like this one regarding other NPC's.

And, of course, if you like it endorse it so others see it too!
[/font]
author: Elektrika

files.name: Vilkas (alternative)
files.changelogHtml: Changed Vilkas' hairstyle (the previous one glitched behind his ears) and warpaint (put the vanilla style on).

files.name: Vilkas (alternative) and Farkas replacer
files.changelogHtml: Changed Vilkas' hairstyle (the previous one glitched behind his ears) and warpaint (put the vanilla style on).
